Ingredients.1: 1 (6 pound) beef eye of round roast

Ingredients.5: 1 (1 ounce) packet au jus gravy mix

Directions.2: Line the bottom of a slow cooker with onion slices, then place roast on onions.

Directions.3: Mix red wine, water, gravy mix, soup mix, and bay leaves together; pour over roast. Cook on Low for 8 hours.

Directions.4: Remove roast from slow cooker and set aside to cool. Remove and discard bay leaves. Run onions and juice through a blender, then transfer blended juice back to the slow cooker and bring to a boil.

Directions.5: Mix cornstarch and water together in a small dish and add to the boiling sauce. Cook until sauce is consistency of a thick gravy. Add paprika.

Directions.6: Slice roast crosswise on a slight diagonal into 1/2-inch slices. Pour sauce over meat and serve.
